text: Shamsha Kopbaevna Berkimbayeva (; 10 October 1942 â€“ 7 April 2022) was a Kazakh academic and politician. She was Minister of Education and Science from 2002 to 2003. Berkimbayeva died on 7 April 2022 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Kazakhstani politicians Category:Academics
title: Shamsha Berkimbayeva
